page.title:
to Better Health

Walking on a Path to Better Health
Walking on a Path to Better Health
page.normal_text:
Overview •Teaches participants to view walking as a viable way to get their recommended level of physical activity at work or home.
Overview
•Teaches participants to view walking as a viable way
to get their recommended level of physical activity at
work or home.
page.enlisting:
•Demonstrates how to use safe walking techniques.
•Demonstrates how to use safe walking techniques.
page.normal_text:
•Recommends walking as a way to get healthy while spending quality time with friends and family.
•Recommends walking as a way to get healthy while
spending quality time with friends and family.

page.title:
Learning Objective 5:
Learning Objective 5:
page.normal_text:
• Recognize walking as a way to be physically active with friends and family members. Examples include:
• Recognize walking as a way to be physically active
with friends and family members. Examples include:
page.enlisting:
– Establishing or participating in a neighborhood walking club – Walking your dog with your children – Walking your children to school – Others?

page.title:
Learning Objective 6:
Learning Objective 6:
page.enlisting:
• Monitor their exertion during physical activity. – Use the “talk test” • With moderate intensity you should be able to talk without • With vigorous intensity activity you should be able to say a few – Participants self-monitor by asking themselves • How does it feel? • How warm am I? • What is my breathing like? • Monitor their exertion during physical activity.
• Monitor their exertion during physical activity.

page.title:
Learning Objective 7:
Learning Objective 7:
page.enlisting:
– Have children help shop for and prepare meals • Name one new way to get family members to eat more fruits and vegetables. Examples include: – Eating fruit and vegetables as snacks – Preparing fruit smoothies – Adding vegetables to other meals (pasta dishes such as fettuccini alfredo with tomato, and tuna with shredded carrots) – Have children help shop for and prepare meals
– Have children help shop for and prepare meals
